name: Claret (SlickRamen)
description:
Controls:

W / Up Arrow / Space to jump - Wall jump if close to a wall (don't need to press any other keys, it'll automatically jump

A / Left Arrow, D / Right Arrow to accelerate left and right

R - Restart Level

Escape - Restart Game

You'll die if you touch your blood for too long. You can touch it, but if you stay on it for too long you'll die and have to restart.

There isn't a limit on how fast you can move. You don't lose any velocity when touching the ground, so you'll need to accelerate in the opposite direction to stop moving.

You can disable blood in the options menu.

Programming and design by yours truly, music by @larrynachos
